StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [M8412_Get_NextPeson]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@UserID varchar(15), @person_id int, @.ag varchar(10) AS
DECLARE @orgid int DECLARE @orgCnt int DECLARE @person_id1 int DECLARE @person_id2 int DECLARE @person_id3 int
CREATE table #org1(organiza.on_id int) CREATE table #org2(organiza.on_id int) CREATE table #org3(organiza.on_id int)
DECLARE Cur_Per CURSOR FOR select person_id from M8412_Person_View where organiza.on_id in (select organiza.on_id from #org3) order by LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME
Set @orgid=900 /* SET @orgid=0
SELECT @orgid = o.ORGANIZATION_ID FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION o, USER_LIST u WHERE o.MCC_CODE = u.MCC_CODE AND u.USER_ID = @UserID */
IF @orgid > 0 BEGIN
insert into #org1(organiza.on_id) values(@orgid) select @orgCnt = organiza.on_id from #org1 while(@orgCnt > 0) begin insert into #org2(organiza.on_id) select organiza.on_id from #org1
insert into #org3(organiza.on_id) select organiza.on_id from #org1
delete from #org1 insert into #org1(organiza.on_id) select child_organiza.on_id from ORGANIZATION_MAP where parent_organiza.on_id in (select organiza.on_id from #org2) delete from #org2 select @orgCnt = count(*) from #org1
end END
OPEN Cur_Per FETCH NEXT FROM Cur_Per INTO @person_id2 WHILE (@@FETCH_STATUS = 0) BEGIN if(@person_id2 = @person_id) break
set @person_id1 = @person_id2 FETCH NEXT FROM Cur_Per INTO @person_id2 END FETCH NEXT FROM Cur_Per INTO @person_id3
Close Cur_Per
if(@.ag = 'next') select @person_id3 else select @person_id1
drop table #org1 drop table #org2 drop table #org3
